title: Anil Ambani companies eye big comeback on Rs 17,600-crore boost, debt-free status
description: Anil Ambani's Reliance Group companies could soon drive big growth with Rs 17,600 cr in fundraising and zero debt. They plan Rs 4,500 cr through equity shares, Rs 7,100 cr from Varde Partners via FCCBs, and Rs 6,000 cr through QIP.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
